br.com.caelum.vraptor.proxy

Interface Proxifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JavassistProxifier

    public interface Proxifier
    Implementations of this interface are used to create Proxy instances whenever needed.
    Author:
    Fabio Kung

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isProxy(Object o)
      Return true if the object is a proxy, false otherwise.
      boolean isProxyType(Class<?> type)
      Return true if the type is a proxy, false otherwise.
      <T> T proxify(Class<T> type, MethodInvocation<? super T> handler)
      Creates a proxy for class defined in type parameter.

    • Method Detail

      • proxify

        <T> T proxify(Class<T> type,
              MethodInvocation<? super T> handler)
        Creates a proxy for class defined in type parameter.
        Parameters:
        type - The proxy type.
        handler - Callback for method invocation.
        Returns:
        The proxy.

      • isProxy

        boolean isProxy(Object o)
        Return true if the object is a proxy, false otherwise. null objects always return false.
        Parameters:
        o - The object to test
        Returns:
        true if the object is a proxy, false otherwise.

      • isProxyType

        boolean isProxyType(Class<?> type)
        Return true if the type is a proxy, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        type - Type to test
        Returns:
        true if the object is a proxy, false otherwise.
